attributes.action: State funded media to be forced to promote e-petitions more
attributes.additional_details:
I want to Government to force state funded media (BBC) to promote All e-petitions on a regular basis.

As can be seen, the e-petition "Convicted London rioters should loose all benefits." has already received over 100,000 votes in a very short space of time. I believe this was very much due to the e-petition being shown on the BBC news during the riots.

There are many other deserving e-petitions that the British public should know about, that should also be promoted by the "state funded" BBC.

Other important e-petitions:

CHEAPER PETROL AND DIESEL, BY ROBERT HALFON MP AND FAIR FUEL UK

BAN THE INTRODUCTION OF SHARIA LAW

LEGALISE CANNABIS

RENATIONALISE RAILWAYS

MAKE ST GEORGES DAY A NATIONAL HOLIDAY

ETC ETC

Simple messages like: "Your chance to make you voice heard", "Have you say today, make it law tomorrow"

Don't just read this..... do something and "VOTE FOR THIS"

It just takes a moment and no (very) person details are required.
